      protected void replaceWhiteFromPending​(ResourceType res, java.lang.Integer qt) throws NoWhiteResourceException
      This method replace a white resource in pending in qt selected resources
      Parameters:
      res - is the destination ResourceType
      qt - is the quantity of the converted resource
      Throws:
      NoWhiteResourceException - if there aren't any white resource in pending
